name: Vikings Valhalla
description: VikingsValhalla(VV) was formed on early November 2021, and Launched on February 8th 2022. The founding team consist of 3 people, which coming from UK, Germany, and Singapore, that are specialized on their fields. We have strong developers & experienced marketing team to guide our Moonshot mission. There is no other team that exist today on the crypto space with more ambition and aggressivity than our team here at VikingsValhalla (VV). VikingsValhalla (VV) is deployed on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) We have deployed strategic tokenomics to reward our holders the most with BUSD Stable Coin.
